reviews.review_msg: Professor Tsai is one of the most caring professors I have ever met at SFU. He genuinely cares about his students and is willing to help them if they have any difficulties. He tests you on what he teaches, so there are no surprises on his exams.

His notes are mostly proofs. they help a bit. Focus on understanding his assignments & practice tests. He's very fair & available to help if you're stuck. There's no surprises on tests if you've been studying the homework. He actually cares a lot & is very understanding. When students had problems he would always listen and try to accommodate us.

Final grade is worth 45%
Class final average below 50%
Need C for ACMA 401 afterwards
Grades not scaled
Joke professor
